author: SohamBhattacharya
body:
This PR changes Phase-2 HLT Egamma paths to use the GT emulator.
Tests:
 - Testing on 200 events (PU 0) of [1] shows minor differences before [1a] and after [1b]
 - Testing on 200 events (PU 0) of [2] shows minor differences before [2a] and after [2b]

Tagging @cms-sw/l1-l2
@rovere fyi

Request for egamma @ravindkv @DebabrataBhowmik @skeshri : please test the egamma path efficiencies in a PU200 sample.

[1]
